meanings.definition: relating to the study or tracing of lines of family descent
meanings.sent1: The genealogically important document revealed our family tree.
meanings.sent2: She approached the genealogically significant records with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The genealogically curious cat tried to trace its ancestry.
meanings.sent4: The genealogically deep roots of our family history intertwined beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The genealogically intricate details of our lineage fascinated me.

meanings.definition: in a manner pertaining to family history or ancestry
meanings.sent1: He researched genealogically to uncover his roots.
meanings.sent2: She spoke genealogically about her family's traditions.
meanings.sent3: The cake recipe was passed down genealogically through generations.
meanings.sent4: The stories were shared genealogically, connecting past to present.
meanings.sent5: The old photo albums were organized genealogically by era.
